item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Bypass DeepSeek censorship by speaking in hex (529 points | 276 comments)

23. AI and two hundred dollar tasks (65 points | 55 comments)
